message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $10000 by both parties. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be beneficial for you to own it. My first offer to you is $9500.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $9500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $8500 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value we've both agreed upon.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to meet somewhere in the middle. My counteroffer to you is $9000 for the product. I believe this price reflects the value of the item while remaining within your budget.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $9000 is closer to what I'm looking for, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to pay $8750 for the product. This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement at this price.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I'm glad we're making progress. My counteroffer to you is $8900 for the product. I believe this price is fair for both of us, considering the value of the item and your budget constraints.
